abstract: The biggest oil companies in the United States and Europe benefited from higher oil prices and earnings from refining.
snippet: The biggest oil companies in the United States and Europe benefited from higher oil prices and earnings from refining.
lead_paragraph: Exxon Mobil and Royal Dutch Shell reported huge increases in their first-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by higher oil prices and earnings from refining.

headline.main: Profit Jumps at Exxon and Shell
headline.print_headline: Revenue From Refining Helped Lift Profit at Exxon Mobil and Shell
